name: pico-mastermind
description:
The game mastermind built in pico-8

The game will randomly select colours for the final row based on your selected difficulty. Easy will ensure the selected colours are all different, wheras hard could give you mulitple of the same colour. 

You have a limited number of guesses to work out what is in the last row. Each time you submit a guess the 4 pins above the row will be set. red means you managed to get the right colour on the right spot, white means you got the right colour on the wrong spot, and a grey means you didn't get one of the colours right. keep in mind that the top 2x2 of pins does not correspond to a particular position on the 1x4 row.

controls:

z/x/arrow keys (viewable by clicking the controller icon within the web player)
